discription: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.
A short, strong drink (about 30 ml) served in an espresso cup.
Espresso with a little milk foam (drink size about 50 ml).

A coffee drink with a double espresso and lightly frosted milk (About 150–240 ml). Served in a glass.

An espresso pulled long (50–60 ml). Served in an espresso/cappuccino cup. Served in an espresso cup.
Espresso with a little milk foam and a bit of ice with heavy coffe. Served in an espresso cup.
A coffee drink with a double espresso and lightly frosted milk (About 150–240 ml). Served in an espresso cup.
